title: Better to Forget Than to Meet Again - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Cold Protagonist   Cruel Characters   Death of Loved Ones   Depictions of Cruelty   Drugs   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Forced Living Arrangements   Forced Marriage   Love Rivals   Misunderstandings   Persistent Love Interests   Poor Protagonist   Revenge   Weak Protagonist
author: Shi Chen   时辰
description: She thought it would be a new beginning for her when she got out from the jail. She didn't want to be connected with that man again. However, to ask the kid back, she had no alternative but to please him! He hated her to death for killing his beloved fiancée. Her mom hated her so much that she would rather kill her by plotting with other people. The kid died...and drug addiction came to her... If only she had never agreed the surrogacy! She wouldn't end up like this!>
